subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy surged back after falling behind in the final round, holding off Phil Mickelson and the darkness after a two-hour rain delay Valhalla Golf Club.
snippet: Rory McIlroy surged back after falling behind in the final round, holding off Phil Mickelson and the darkness after a two-hour rain delay Valhalla Golf Club.
